Cecil Higgs (ubochí irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Juun 1898, Thaba Nchu, Orange Free State rụo ụbọchị irí na isii n'ọnwa Juun 1986, Cape Town, South Africa) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na South Africa
Ọ bụ nwa nke atọ na nwa nwanyị nke abụọ n'ime ụmụ ise nke Clement Higgs na nwunye ya Florence
Na 1912, nná Higgs nwụrụ mgbè ọ dị afọ irí isé
N'afọ 1916, Higgs ghọrọ ónyé bi na Wesleyan Girls' High School (nke bụzi Kingswood College) na Grahamstown
E gbùrù nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye, Clement jr., na 1916 na Agha Ụwa Mbụ

Higgs debanyere aha ya na Grahamstown School of Art na 1918, mana na 1920 ọ banyere ụgbọ mmírí gaa England ma nọrọ na mbà ọzọ ruo afọ 13. Ọ zụrụ na London na Byam Shaw School of Art, na Goldsmiths' College na, site na 1926, na Royal Academy of Arts
Otú ọ dị, a kpọrọ Higgs ka ọ laghachi South Africa n'ihi ọrịa nné ya, ónyé nwụrụ na 1934
Higgs mere ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na ụlọ nzukọ sayensị nke Mahadum Stellenbosch na 1935, na-ezute ónyé na-ese ihe Wolf Kibel na ónyé na-akpụ ihe Lippy Lipshitz
N'afọ 1938, ya na Rene Graetz, Maggie Laubser na Lippy Lipshitz mere ihe ngosi
N'afọ 1938 ọ laghachiri Paris, mana ọ hapụrụ n'ihi Agha Ụwa nke Abụọ
Higgs sonyeere New Group nke na-enupụ isi megide ụdị nka ọdịnala
N'afọ 1939, Higgs malitere ọbụbụenyi ndụ ya na ónyé na-ese ihe n'England bụ John Dronsfield
N'afọ 1953, o mere naanị ihe ngosi onwé ya na Orange Free State
Higgs mechara biri na Sea Point, agbanyeghị mmetụta nke oké osimiri na ihe osise ya mere ka ọ bụrụ ónyé na-ese ihe n'oké osimiri
N'afọ 1964, o wuru ụlọ na Onrust
E mechara chọpụta na Higgs nwere ọrịa Alzheimer, na 1984 ọ kwagara na Protea Park Nursing Home, ebe ọ nwụrụ na 16 June 1986.
N'afọ 1964, e nyèrè Higgs ihe nrite ọla edo nkè Suid-Afrikaanse Akademie van Wetenskap en Kuns.
